quote: As god is my witness, it was never my intent to throw out the constitution. I thought it was hanging by a thread, and I could save it... You don't save it by cutting that thread. - President Nielson
quote_letters: AS GOD IS MY WITNESS IT WAS NEVER MY INTENT TO THROW OUT THE CONSTITUTION I THOUGHT IT WAS HANGING BY A THREAD AND I COULD SAVE IT YOU DONT SAVE IT BY CUTTING THAT THREAD - PRESIDENT NIELSON
